mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qa (user_id, qa_title, qa_content, comment_status) VALUES ( #{userDto.id}, #{qaTitle}, #{qaContent}, false)
mapper.select: SELECT t2.user_id id, t2.email, t2.name, t2.role, t1.qa_id, t1.qa_title, t1.qa_content, t1.qa_comment, t1.comment_status, t1.create_time FROM qa t1 JOIN user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
